QuestData.Title: With Lance and Larion
QuestData.Description:
Say what you want about phalynx, but Larion will always have one major advantage.
Wings!
A bonded larion will hunt alongside you whether you are on the ground or in the air.
Take my javelin and Andira then go out into the fields to hunt the cloudfeathers there. You'll feel the boon of larion companionship firsthand!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Cloudfeather Greatwing in Greatwing Roost.
QuestData.RewardText: It is such a satisfying experience to see your larion take wing to help take down your prey.
